Subject: Expired Code Signing Certificate on executables
Description: The code signing certificate on pingcastle.exe 3.3.0.1 and pingcastleautoupdater.exe expired on 10/22/2024 and one of our clients is refusing to allow us to execute the tool on their systems because of it.
DevOps_Steps_to_Reproduce__c: 1- Verify the Pingcastle.exe code signing certificate and find it expired.
What_We_Know__c: the code signing certificate is expired. -they need to download version 3.3.0.8 from the portal
Next_Steps__c: Wait for customer to download version 3.3.0.8
